justification: "The model captures response caution (i.e., the amount of information required to reach a decision) via the response threshold parameter."

measured_by: Difference between LBA response thresholds for the two alternatives
justification: "Differences in thresholds between response alternatives produce a bias in favor of the response with the lower threshold, because less evidence is required to trigger that response than the competing response(s)."
